text: Stephen John Perryman (born 21 December 1951) is a former English football player. He has played for England national team. == Career statistics == === Club === Appearances and goals by club, season and competition. Steve Perryman.com. Retrieved 20 March 2013. Club Season League FA Cup League Cup EuropeIncludes UEFA Cup and UEFA Cup Winners' Cup (1981–82 and 1982–83). OtherIncludes appearances in Texaco Cup (3 in 1970–71), Anglo-Italian League Cup (2 in 1971), Charity Shield (1981, 1982), ScreenSport Super Cup (5 in 1985–86) and Football League Trophy (Associate Members' Cup) (3 in 1987–88, 1 in 1988–89 and 1 in 1989–90). OtherIncludes appearances in Texaco Cup (3 in 1970–71), Anglo-Italian League Cup (2 in 1971), Charity Shield (1981, 1982), ScreenSport Super Cup (5 in 1985–86) and Football League Trophy (Associate Members' Cup) (3 in 1987–88, 1 in 1988–89 and 1 in 1989–90).
